transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Customer: Yeah. Hi Uday sir, very good afternoon.
Executive: Good afternoon.
Customer: So Sumit Sumit is speaking sir from IndiaMART. How are you sir?
Customer: What's your name?
Executive: Sumit sir.
Customer: Yeah Sumit tell me.
Executive: Uh sir actually just called you related to our form which is running with IndiaMART by the name of Urban Clay from Karnul.
Customer: Okay sir one mail we have received from your side na related to the buyleads parts right?
Executive: Actually sir I had a conversation with you last week also related to the same that like we are dealing in approximate 50 kilometer to 100 kilometers and there will be the less enquiry of your products in your areas right sir.
Customer: But that's what I told even before na even before I enrolled to this program that is exactly what I told maximum what I can go for 100 kilometers nothing more than that.
Customer: 99.99% of the deals or the buyleads are coming from Hyderabad.
Customer: Hyderabad is around 250 kilometers.
Executive: Okay exactly.
Customer: Yeah so there is no point I cannot satisfy customer's pricing needs.
Executive: For one simple reason because of the logistics.
Customer: Sir I totally agree but I have checked in your products and areas of your dealings but actually the enquiry in the product in which you are dealing was is less. Rare to rare they are coming from your area because one enquiry has came today for your products from the Karnul and it has came for for five hours ago. And I don't know that when the next enquiry of that particular product will come that's the show me one I didn't see anything I was checking from the morning kuch bhi nahi tha.
Executive: Sir it has came solid concrete block you can check from the relevant tab it is showing you.
Customer: Solid concrete hai na wo solid concrete hai hamara interlocking hai na yaar.
Executive: So that is not my products.
Customer: I will do one thing I'll just call you back huh. Just get me minute I'll call you back.
summary:
Concerns:

- Most buyleads are from Hyderabad (250 km).

- Cannot satisfy customer's pricing needs due to logistics.

- Customer says he didn't see any buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed that the enquiry is less.

- Executive mentioned one enquiry came from Karnul.

- Executive said to check solid concrete block in relevant tab.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, logistics, product enquiry
